meanings.sent1: The sheriff deputizes his trusted friend to help him.
meanings.sent2: The mayor deputizes a new officer to assist with the community event.
meanings.sent3: The teacher deputizes the class clown to keep an eye on the mischievous students.
meanings.sent4: The captain deputizes the first mate to take charge in his absence.
meanings.sent5: The coach deputizes the star player to lead the team to victory.

meanings.sent1: During the vacation, Sarah deputizes for her boss at the office.
meanings.sent2: The loyal dog deputizes for the missing guard in protecting the house.
meanings.sent3: The robot deputizes for the human worker in assembling the products.
meanings.sent4: The substitute teacher deputizes for the regular teacher in managing the classroom.
meanings.sent5: The older sibling deputizes for the parents in taking care of the younger ones.
